userManagement.disableText: After confirming to disable the account, {email} will not be able to log in .
userManagement.saveEmailText: We will send a verification email to {email}.Please notify the user to log in to the mailbox to complete the account verification.
userManagement.activate: After confirming the activation of the account, {email} will be able to log in and use normally.
userManagement.deleteText: Deleted account cannot be retrieved，careful operation.
userManagement.mesOnlyKeyboard: Only support Chinese and English, numbers and special symbols on the keyboard

userManagement.goActivate: The account is not activated. Please activate
userManagement.noOntoF: Click the |Create| button to add a account
userManagement.userHasKnowledgeGraphError: Deletion failed, please confirm that the user does not manage any knowledge graph!
userManagement.userHasKnowledgeNetError: Deletion failed, please confirm that the user does not manage any knowledge network!
userManagement.nameConsists: Only support Chinese and English, numbers and underline
userManagement.passStrong: Use 8 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers & symbols
userManagement.invalidationText: Please contact the administrator to obtain the link again
userManagement.changeSuccess: Password changed successfully. Please login again
userManagement.passTheSame: The new password cannot be the same as the old password
userManagement.emailUesd: E-mail has been used, please modify
userManagement.activeSuccess: Successful account activation, please log in
userManagement.nameDisable: The account name can‘t be used, please modify
userManagement.resetText: We will send a verification email to {email}. Please inform the user to log in to the email to reset the password.
userManagement.locked: Account locked. Please try again in {time} minutes or contact the administrator to reset the password.
userManagement.wordLow: The password level is too low, please reset the password immediately
userManagement.userTimeOut: The current password has expired, please reset your password immediately
userManagement.mailTime: The reset email has expired, please resend
userManagement.leastOne: Please select at least one permission to assign!
userManagement.modifySuccess: Knowledge graph permission has been opened successfully!
userManagement.emptyDesc: There is no knowledge graph permission to assign
userManagement.noAuth: Currently does not have permission for this knowledge graph.
userManagement.unabledChange: The current authority cannot modify the account authority, you can contact the super administrator to modify the authority.
userManagement.noExist: The knowledge garph does not exist, unable to perform the operation!
userManagement.noExist1: The operation failed. The current knowledge graph has been deleted!
userManagement.noExistAll: Knowledge graph does not exist, cannot operate!
userManagement.userNoExist: Account has been deleted, unable to operate!
userManagement.userNoExistPart: Some account has been deleted, unable to operate!
userManagement.userNoAuth: Unable to perform partial permission assignment, please modify your identity and try again!
userManagement.userNoAuthAll: Account cannot assign permission, please modify identity first!
userManagement.err: unset the SMTP Server, please set it first and try again!
userManagement.lowAuth: Unable to assign equal or above permissions!
userManagement.lowAuthPart: Some accounts can‘t be assigned equal or above permissions at present!
userManagement.cannotAssign: The account cannot be assigned relevant permissions, please try again!
userManagement.cannotAssignPart: Some account cannot be assigned relevant permissions, please try again!
userManagement.abnormal: The exception in the account assignment permission, please try again!
userManagement.abnormalPart: Some exceptions in the permission allocation of some accounts, please try again!
userManagement.pwHolder: Enter initial login password to activate account
userManagement.contactAdmin: Contact administrator to reset your password
userManagement.notSMTP: Not configured STMP, configure it by【Setting- SMTP】
userManagement.ldapActFiled: You cannot activate an account that does not belong to the same LDAP service!
userManagement.noUserWords: No relevant user found, please change the query content
userManagement.synchFailed: Synchronization failed! The currently synchronized mailbox duplicates the existing mailbox of anydata. You can delete the existing account and synchronize again.
userManagement.mailFailed: Synchronization failed. The current mailbox is duplicate with the existing account!
userManagement.synAccessFiledTip: Synchronization failed! LDAP connection error, you can synchronize again!
userManagement.moreUser: Synchronization failed! There are multiple LDAP query users
userManagement.moreUserTip: Synchronization failed! There are multiple LDAP query users,you can synchronize again!
userManagement.searUserFiledTip: Synchronization failed, LDAP query error,you can synchronize again!
userManagement.ldapUserAttrFiled: Synchronization failed! LDAP user attribute exception
userManagement.ldapUserAttrFiledTip: Synchronization failed! LDAP user attribute exception,you can synchronize again!
userManagement.MailSuffixDifference: Synchronization failed. The current mailbox suffix is inconsistent with the synchronized mailbox suffix!
userManagement.MailSuffixDifferenceTip: Synchronization failed. The current mailbox suffix is inconsistent with the synchronized mailbox suffix. You can disable / delete the synchronized account and synchronize again
userManagement.noMailSuffix: Synchronization failed. The current mailbox format is illegal!
userManagement.noMailSuffixTip: Synchronization failed. The current mailbox format is illegal! You can modify LDAP to legal mailbox format, and then synchronize.
userManagement.searchNull: Synchronization failed，LDAP user query is empty
userManagement.ladpUserActiveError: LADP users are not allowed to activate
